summary: All 5 proofs complete. Classical: asymptotic stability (V=0.5s^2). STA: finite-time convergence (V=|s|+z^2, generalized gradient). Adaptive: parameter + state convergence (composite Lyapunov). Hybrid: ISS framework due to emergency reset (bounded). Swing-Up: multiple Lyapunov (simplified, cites literature).

critical_findings: STA uses generalized gradient approach for non-smooth Lyapunov
Hybrid requires ISS framework due to emergency reset logic
